definition: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: When young and frivolous feel there is nothing, there will be efforts to results.
sentences.chinese: 年少轻狂的时候觉得事在人为，努力就一定会有结果。

sentences.english: Hopes the enterprise love concurrently, everything depends on human effort.
sentences.chinese: 希望事业爱情兼得，事在人为。

sentences.english: Solutions depend on human effort. If someone acts, results will follow.
sentences.chinese: 事在人为，只要有人做，就会有效果。

sentences.english: Decisions are too important to leave to chance.
sentences.chinese: 要武断地决定，不要事在人为。

sentences.english: Mankind may one day meet this fate.
sentences.chinese: 人类有一天也会面临被事在人为的命运。

sentences.english: Is success in life earned or do people succeed because they are lucky?
sentences.chinese: 成功是事在人为还是听天由命？

sentences.english: Things can get better, but you have to make them so.
sentences.chinese: 事情的确可以好转，但事在人为。

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
pinyin: you3 zhi4 zhe3 shi4 jing4 cheng2

definition: man can conquer nature (idiom); human wisdom can prevail over nature

lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through. (idiom)/fig. Everything will turn out for the best./Let's worry about it when it happens./It will be all right on the night./cf couplet 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 bi4 you3 lu4

definition: lit. when the boat gets to the pier-head, it will go straight with the current (proverb)/fig. everything will be all right/cf 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直|车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
pinyin: chuan2 dao4 qiao2 tou2 zi4 ran2 zhi2

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 天下无难事，只怕有心人

definition: to try one's utmost/to strive
Heaven never bars one's way (idiom); don't despair and you will find a way through./Never give up hope./Never say die.
pinyin: tian1 wu2 jue2 ren2 zhi1 lu4

definition: providence/the Will of Heaven
decreed by fate (idiom)/destined/fated
life and death are ruled by fate (idiom)

Since they have come, we should make them comfortable (idiom). Since we're here, take it easy./Since this is so, we should accept it./Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth./If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.
pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

definition: to insist on/to demand/to impose
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
everything
